attributes.action: To ensure that laws ensure the perpetrators of the Credit Crunch serve time in jail just as Nick Leason had to and that their assets be seized
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When Nick Leason was involved in money market wrong doing he was jailed.

I believe that the size and Global impact of the Credit Crunch means that the perpetrators and followers of their schemes be appropriately punished, and their ill gotten gains be returned to the public who have been swindled.
